text: Naludɨ iamɨgali ninanadi agɨladɨ igɨlaŋ sɨhɨm sabaŋ agadɨ ma na fɨhala fɨhala me hɨniavɨci aba abɨhalaŋ uami. Ha naludɨ ulaŋ mikɨ hɨsɨŋ agɨladɨ abɨlaŋ vehavɨci hudɨmɨda hameŋ hafalavɨla heŋ nɨhalaŋ aba abɨhalaŋ uami. Hudɨmɨda hafalavɨci ulaŋ iaganu agaŋ lugɨlɨci valɨ vameba iahɨci heŋ sɨhɨm agadɨ lamɨci na fɨhalɨhalaŋ aba abɨhalaŋ uami.
